Articles.Title: Dollar slips, yen steady after Japanese finance minister comments
Articles.Description: ​The dollar dipped on Tuesday as traders waited on a fresh catalyst to give clues on Federal Reserve policy, while the yen was steady after Japan's finance minister said that he would not rule out any measures to cope with the weakening currency.
